When we learn a language we focus on specific details at times, to get a clearer sense of the language. At other times we allow the language to enter our brain with less than perfect comprehension. Both help us grow in the language.

0:00 How I do "unfocussed" language learning.
3:41 I find doing focussed work after more big picture learning effective.
5:26 Going through content in sentence mode.
6:34 Keep on listening even if you don't understand, it will improve your focus in the long run.
